parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate by name, surname, or any other clear identifier.  The content focuses on general energy projects and their long-term impact.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its content addresses general issues related to energy investments and their impact on future generations.  The reach estimate indicates a wide potential audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post is not to influence votes for or against any particular candidate. The content focuses on a discussion of long-term energy projects and their societal implications. While energy policy might be a topic discussed during elections, this post does not directly advocate for or against any specific candidate or party's stance on the issue.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post appears to be journalistic in nature, presenting information and analysis on a topic of public interest (energy policy). The link directs to an article on the website romania1.ro, further suggesting a journalistic approach.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; rather, it presents information and analysis on a topic of public interest. There is no indication of personal bias or an attempt to sway public opinion towards a specific candidate or party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>769255268715581</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, focusing on long-term energy projects and their impact on future generations, does not constitute electoral propaganda.  While energy policy is a relevant topic during elections, this post lacks any direct or indirect endorsement of, or opposition to, any specific candidate or party. The content is presented in a journalistic style, providing information and analysis rather than advocating for a particular political viewpoint. The absence of any reference to specific candidates or parties, combined with the journalistic nature of the content, strongly suggests that this post does not violate Article 98 t).
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Eoficial.ro</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
